main event: A military source reported a UFO sighting in Las Vegas, Nevada in September 1954. The object was described as having a rounded nose, changing from black to bright orange, and disappeared at a specific elevation and azimuth.
interesting points: The observation lasted less than a minute.
The object's color changed from black to bright orange.
No contrails were observed despite thunderstorms and clouds in the area.
The observation took place in dark light conditions.
The conclusion listed possible explanations as a ball-shaped object, balloon, aircraft, astronomical, or unknown.
sighted object: One UFO with a rounded nose changing from black to bright orange
